title: Doubt about pessat being scraped
content: So abt 40% is through kcet ( govt site ) what about the rest 60% excl the mngm seats??? Is 60% through jee mains only or BOTH jee and kcet. I was thinking 60% through jee but is that true or both scores is going to be used

comments.body:
15% management seats are there   
and 45% jee and kcet both is written   
but ig in that 45% mainly jee will be there and if seats remain then will go to kcet   
I might be wrong

Isn't jee better.
Far more competitive and ppl will have less trust issue of college manipulating results.
Imo getting students with jee rank of 30k is as good as kcet kids with 2k rank.
